DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this phase 3 study is to determine the safety and efficacy of cyclosporine in the treatment of dry eye syndrome.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Cyclosporine in the Treatment of Dry Eye Syndrome (ST-603-007)
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of moderate to severe dry eye syndrome with or without Sjogren's syndrome or other autoimmune disease Intraocular or refractive surgery in the study eye within 3 months prior to study start Unwilling to discontinue use of contact lenses during the runin and duration of the study Pregnancy or lactation
